description.value:
1. Mutant: Roll once on Mutations table, or spend 200xp to choose any one result that is lower than 76.
2. Insane: +3 Toughness, -3 Fellowship or -1 Fate Point. Gain Peer (The Insane). Gain 2d10 Insanity Points.
3. Deviant Philosphy: +3 Willpower and Enemy(Ecclesiarchy) Talent

requirements.text: Origin Path: Lure of the Void
